channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mistral closes in on Big AI rivals with new open-weight frontier and small models
item.description: Mistral unveils its Mistral 3 lineup, including a frontier model and efficient small models designed for offline, customizable enterprise use—aiming t...

item.title: Your iPhone Already Has iPhone Fold Software, but Apple Won’t Let You Use It
item.description: Recent exploits show iPadOS windows running on an iPhone, hinting at the future of Apple hardware and software alike—while also possibly revealing its...

item.title: Paris-based AI voice startup Gradium nabs $70M seed
item.description: Gradium, a startup spawned out of French AI lab Kyutai (backed by French telecom billionaire Xavier Niel), launched out of stealth on Tuesday.

item.title: Amazon releases an impressive new AI chip and teases a Nvidia-friendly roadmap
item.description: AWS has been building its own AI chips – and systems – for years now. It just released its third version, known as Trainium3 with some impressive spec...

item.title: Vitamix Promo Codes and Deals: $25 Off + Free Shipping
item.description: Score discounts on blenders, food processors, immersion blenders, and more with our selection of Vitamix coupons and deals.

item.title: DOGE Isn’t Dead. Here’s What Its Operatives Are Doing Now
item.description: Contrary to popular reports, DOGE has “burrowed into the agencies like ticks,” government sources tell WIRED.

item.title: Titan OS raises $58 million from Highland Europe for its smart TV OS
item.description: Titan OS aims to expand its independent TV operating system in Europe and Latin America.

item.title: Simular’s AI agent wants to run your Mac, Windows PC for you
item.description: Simular, a startup building AI agents for Mac OS and Windows, has solved the AI hallucination problem in an compelling way.

item.title: Melinda French Gates on Secrets: ‘Live a Truthful Life, Then You Don’t Have Any’
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Big Interview podcast, the philanthropist offers her insights on billionaire donors, kids on phones, and the importance ...

item.title: AWS announces new capabilities for its AI agent builder
item.description: AWS is introducing new capabilities for its AI agent building platform, including memory and evaluation tools.
